# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new activation conditions object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init()
```

## Return Value

A new activation conditions object.

## Creating an activation conditions object

- **init(coder:)**: Restores an activation conditions object from the specified archive.
